title: Into Darkness
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2rhp89I

by Axisunicorn

Young Ben Solo is captured while on his way to meet the mysterious Snoke. Unable to contact Snoke or anyone else through the Force, Ben is held captive and tortured by the man known as Khan. So begins his descent into darkness, away from the watchful eyes of the Skywalkers. Left to the devices of a damaged but brilliant psychopath who desires nothing more than to break him bit by bit, Ben Solo begins his transformation into Kylo Ren, for good or ill. He was a boy who had wanted nothing more than to be cared for and loved, but sometimes love is best learned through hatred.

Words: 3514, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy, Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Trek: Alternate Original Series (Movies), Star Trek
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Rape/Non-Con, Underage
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Ben Solo, Kylo Ren, Khan Noonien Singh (Star Trek - All Media Types), Leia Organa (mentioned), Snoke, Original Characters, Luke Skywalker
  • Relationships: Ben Solo/Khan Noonien Singh, Kylo Ren/Khan Noonien Singh
  • Additional Tags: Rape, Rape/Non-con Elements, BDSM, Young Ben Solo, Ben Solo Needs A Hug, Child Abuse, Child Abandonment, Abuse, Khan is a horrible person in this fic, Leia Organa is too busy being a politician, Ben Solo just wants to be loved, Anal Sex, Oral Sex, Rough Sex, Painful Sex, Angst, So much angst, Dark fic, nothing about this story is nice

summary: Ben Solo & the Four Force Ghosts
title: Ben Solo & the Four Force Ghosts
description:
by reylomami

The Force Ghost participation no one asked for, based on the 1993 Robert Downey Jr. film “Heart and Souls”.

Four Force Ghosts are bound to their corporeal being, Ben Solo, who they have to use to help fulfill their last wishes until their soul can properly rest in peace. When his imaginary friends return to his life in adulthood, Kylo Ren’s attempts to woo Rey is severely compromised. Or at least, that’s what he thinks. Little does he realise that the little favours he is doing for his not-so-imaginary friends are helping him to re-discover himself and the old identity he has long renounced.

Rey watches the once formidable and uptight Kylo Ren unravel and submit to idiosyncrasies that she cannot understand. She likes him though, in spite of herself (and his oddities).

Words: 9500, Chapters: 6/20, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy, Star Wars Prequel Trilogy, Star Wars Original Trilogy, Heart and Souls (1993), Star Wars: Clone Wars (2003) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey (Star Wars), Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Lando Calrissian, Ahsoka Tano, Padmé Amidala, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Maz Kanata, Finn (Star Wars), Poe Dameron, Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Snoke (Star Wars)
  • Relationships: Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey & Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Padmé Amidala/Anakin Skywalker
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Alternate Universe - Modern with Magic, Force Ghost(s), Force Ghost Padmé Amidala, Force Ghost Obi-Wan Kenobi, Heart and Souls 1993 au, ie force ghosts follow Ben Solo from birth, Corporate AU, Kylo Ren Has Issues, Kylo Ren Needs a Hug, Rey Needs A Hug, rating to be changed, This is the RDJ film that needs more attention, Fluff and Angst, Fluff and Smut, Angst and Humor, an attempt, It sounds hella crazy but I swear I temper it with logic and realism, implied finn/poe - Freeform, Finn is the only one who can see what Ben sees lol, Skywalker Family Drama, Family Feels, Family Fluff, HAPPY ENDING FO SHO, Grandma Padme takes care of little ben into his adulthood, A guide to Romance, Mental Issues implied, but it is not

title: Star Wars (2015) #10 Review
excerpt: A blog about comics and graphic novels
description: The Leia, Han, and Sana story continues to remain a waste of time, but this issue remains modestly interesting because of Luke’s development and the diversion of Chewbacca and C-3PO rescue mission.

reblog.comment: The Leia, Han, and Sana story continues to remain a waste of time, but this issue remains modestly interesting because of Luke’s development and the diversion of Chewbacca and C-3PO rescue mission.

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

title: N'epar nu pirur!
body:
[Neh-PAHR noo PEER-oor]

It won’t eat or drink anything. (It can wait - no rush.)

summary: Ben Solo and the Four Force Ghosts
title: Ben Solo and the Four Force Ghosts
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BJqtft

by reylomami

The Force Ghost participation no one asked for, based on the 1993 film “Heart and Souls”. Four Force Ghosts are bound to their corporeal being, Ben Solo, who they have to use to help fulfill their last wishes until their soul can rest in peace.

When his imaginary friends return to his life in adulthood, Kylo Ren’s attempts to woo Rey is severely compromised. Or at least, that’s what he thinks. Little does he realise that the little favours he is doing for his not-so-imaginary friends are helping him to re-discover himself and the old identity he has long renounced.

Rey watches the once formidable and uptight Kylo Ren unravel and submit to idiosyncrasies that she cannot understand. She likes him, in spite of herself - and his oddities.

Words: 2521, Chapters: 2/20, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy, Star Wars Prequel Trilogy, Star Wars Original Trilogy, Heart and Souls (1993), Star Wars: Clone Wars (2003) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey (Star Wars), Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Lando Calrissian, Ahsoka Tano, Padmé Amidala, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Maz Kanata, Finn (Star Wars), Poe Dameron, Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Snoke (Star Wars)
  • Relationships: Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey & Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Padmé Amidala/Anakin Skywalker
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Alternate Universe - Modern with Magic, Force Ghost(s), Force Ghost Padmé Amidala, Force Ghost Obi-Wan Kenobi, Heart and Souls 1993 au, ie force ghosts follow Ben Solo from birth, Corporate AU, Kylo Ren Has Issues, Kylo Ren Needs a Hug, Rey Needs A Hug, rating to be changed, This is the RDJ film that needs more attention, Fluff and Angst, Fluff and Smut, Angst and Humor, an attempt, It sounds hella crazy but I swear I temper it with logic and realism, implied finn/poe - Freeform, Finn is the only one who can see what Ben sees lol, Skywalker Family Drama, Family Feels, Family Fluff, HAPPY ENDING FO SHO


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BJqtft
